sql.value: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW TMP_REC_DATA_RULE_ENGINE AS SELECT * FROM DATA_RULE_ENGINE WHERE PER_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM TMP_REC_CNT_LIBRES )
